Projects & Experience

LetsSankalp - Connectree


Duration: 26 May 2014 - 25 July 2014

Description:
LetsSankalp is an innovative project idea to design an interface between NGOs and investors and generate project reports for both NGOs and investors on daily/weekly/monthly basis.

My Role:

  • Involved in UI design of the interface
  • Worked in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and javascript

Project url: crowd-sourcing-report.appspot.com

EpsomUI - Persistent Systems Limited


Duration: 26 May 2014 - 25 July 2014

Description:
This 2 month summer internship project was about developing a UI Testing tool for websites using DOM and screenshot comparison.

My Role:

  • Involved in DOM comparison approach
  • Worked in HTML, CSS, Javascript, node.js, grunt.js
